about_the_game:
It’s a Wrap! is a 2D puzzle platformer set in the Hollywood of the 80's where you are both the director and the main actor of low-budget action movies.

All you wanted to do today was shoot a nice, trashy B-movie, but everything is going wrong! As the director, you need to synchronize the actors and props that are messing up their timings. Then as the movie's star, you need to remember your blocking and sell the scene.
detailed_description:
It’s a Wrap! is a 2D puzzle platformer set in the Hollywood of the 80's where you are both the director and the main actor of low-budget action movies.

All you wanted to do today was shoot a nice, trashy B-movie, but everything is going wrong! As the director, you need to synchronize the actors and props that are messing up their timings. Then as the movie's star, you need to remember your blocking and sell the scene.

name: It's a Wrap! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A 2D puzzle platformer that would make Hollywood proud.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
